title: [Cleric Guild, Teras Isle]
description: The rough outlines of half pillars have been hewn from the rock, giving the feel of a crude temple.  Two statues, one carved from shimmering glaes and the other from soapstone in a sickly shade of green, glare at each other in the center of the room.  The figures stand on a pedestal of black stone, words painstakingly chipped into the surface.  The angry glow from a small lava window in the floor provides illumination.
paths: Obvious exits: northeast, southeast, southwest, west, northwest, out
